name: SFSpeechRecognitionTaskDelegate
desc: A protocol with methods for managing multi-utterance speech recognition requests.

items.name: func speechRecognitionDidDetectSpeech(SFSpeechRecognitionTask)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the task first detects speech in the source audio.

items.name: func speechRecognitionTaskFinishedReadingAudio(SFSpeechRecognitionTask)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the task is no longer accepting new audio input, even if final processing is in progress.

items.name: func speechRecognitionTask(SFSpeechRecognitionTask, didHypothesizeTranscription: SFTranscription)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a hypothesized transcription is available.

items.name: func speechRecognitionTask(SFSpeechRecognitionTask, didFinishRecognition: SFSpeechRecognitionResult)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the final utterance is recognized.

items.name: func speechRecognitionTask(SFSpeechRecognitionTask, didFinishSuccessfully: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the recognition of all requested utterances is finished.

items.name: func speechRecognitionTaskWasCancelled(SFSpeechRecognitionTask)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the task has been canceled.
